biotools.summary: Transfer annotation from a reference (annotated) genome to an unannotated query genome. It is able to transfer any entry present on a reference sequence, such as the systematic id or an annotator’s notes.

bioschemas.name: RATT
bioschemas.summary: Transfer annotation from a reference (annotated) genome to an unannotated query genome. It is able to transfer any entry present on a reference sequence, such as the systematic id or an annotator’s notes.
